00020     public class Path : Queue<Waypoint>
00021     {
00022         public Path() { }
00023 
00024         /* Create a mirror of this path, for more details, reference to Waypoint.createMirror */
00025         public Path createMirror(bool xReverse, bool yReverse) 
00026         {
00027             Path mirror = new Path();
00028             
00029             foreach (Waypoint waypoint in this)
00030                 mirror.Enqueue(waypoint.createMirror(xReverse, yReverse,
00031                     new Vector2(_GLOBAL.ViewportRect.Width/2, _GLOBAL.ViewportRect.Height/2)));
00032 
00033             return mirror;
00034         }
00035     }
